mapper.select: select a.no, a.title, a.depth, a.hit, b.no as userNo, b.name as userName, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, a.contents from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by a.group_no DESC, a.order_no asc limit #{startRow }, #{pageSize }
mapper.insert:
insert into board values(null, #{title }, #{contents }, now(), #{hit }, (select if(max(a.group_no) is null,'1',max(a.group_no)+1) from board a), 0, 0, #{userNo})
select last_insert_id()
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title }, contents=#{contents } where no=#{userNo }
